column1: odessa addison. born: november | odessa addison. born: november 26
column3: 2015. local florists services for odessa addison will be held at 10am monday
column5: 2015 at brownfield funeral home memorial chapel with rev. cleve kirby officiating. burial will follow in the terry county memorial cemetery under the direction of brownfield funeral home. odessa was born november 26
column6: 1917 in mc. cauley to william edward and sallie katherine maberry. she married milton addison on december 26
column7: 1935 in lamesa. odessa was a member of the brownfield first baptist church and the order of eastern stars. she is preceded in death by her husband of 43 years milton addison and son
column8: robert phil addison. odessa is survived by two sons
column10: jack keith addison of seagraves; daughter
column11: sally sue addison of fort worth; 12 grandchildren; 26 great grandchildren; and 1 great great grandchild. servicesfuneral service monday
column13: 201510:00 ambrownfield funeral home memorial chapel 120 west tate brownfield
